snippet.title: Hellblade: Senua's Sacrifice | Accolades Trailer | (Music: VNV Nation - Illusion)
snippet.description:
The Hellblade: Senua’s Sacrifice Accolades Trailer. A very different kind of accolades trailer.  Firstly, the trailer is created entirely from fan screenshots captured in the Hellblade photo mode. Secondly, instead of highlighting choice press quotes, the trailer highlights some of the many touching messages received by Ninja Theory since the launch of the game in August.

“Illusion" by VNV Nation. Words, music and production by Ronan Harris. Released by Anachron Sounds. Published by Budde Musikverlag.

http://hellbladehelp.info/


Steam: http://store.steampowered.com/app/414340/Hellblade_Senuas_Sacrifice/

PS EU: https://store.playstation.com/#!/en-gb/games/hellblade-senua%e2%80%99s-sacrifice/cid=EP8941-CUSA07527_00-HELLB2017NT002EN

PS US: https://store.playstation.com/#!/en-us/games/hellblade-senua%e2%80%99s-sacrifice/cid=UP3064-CUSA07511_00-HELLB2017NT002EN

GOG: https://www.gog.com/game/hellblade_senuas_sacrifice
